title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, file uploads, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot (simonw/ollama-copilot)
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style code completion plugin that talks to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfiles, tools, and integrations for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU and GPU (CUDA) deployments of Ollama plus optional WebUI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java-sdk)
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models directly from the editor for code explanation or generation.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to an Ollama model and posts replies.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama with streaming markdown display.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via admin-configured chat endpoints with rate limits.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing local Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (hwchase17/ollama-rag-chatbot)
summary: End-to-end LangChain template for a PDF-aware chatbot using Ollama embeddings and Llama-3.
